stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. While the Runner is accessing an agenda from R&D, they must reveal it. Whenever an agenda is accessed or scored, trace[3]. If successful, do 1 brain damage.
text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. While the Runner is accessing an agenda from R&D, they must reveal it. Whenever an agenda is accessed or scored, trace[3]. If successful, do 1 brain damage.
title: Kill Switch
